resources.string:
EasyBike is an open source and cross platform project for public bikes. 
Created by Marc Magnin and Étienne Michon on behalf of the Public Bike Gang.

Any suggestion? 
Please contact us at easybike@outlook.fr. 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/easybike_


You'll find the open source cross platform project on Git. 
If you feel that you want to be part of it, join! 

A special thanks to Florie for her help and patience waiting for me coding hours and hours.
There is nothing such a warmfull review, this is the fuel of the hard work.
This app will never get any ads. Economy must change and advertising is not a solution. If you like this app and think that the hard work is worth it, feel free to make a donation.
This app is also available on Windows Phone. Click here to send the link to your friends!

EasyBike do not collect any personal informations belonging to its users. 
Country flags copyright: 
Free Country Flags (Gang of the Coconuts)/CC-BY-SA 3.0. 
Powered by B-cycle. To sign up, go to www.bcycle.com. 
This is a third-party app not affiliated with B-cycle.
